typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceFile
SourceFile select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDataFromSrcFile
SelectDataFromSrcFile derive(Column_1 = upper(Column_1),
		Column_2 = upper(Column_2)) ~> DoTransformation
DoTransformation sink(input(
		{_c0} as string,
		{_c1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{_c0} = Column_1,
		{_c1} = Column_2
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StotreIntoSQLDatabase
